title: Sugar's Spice: Choose Your Bondage Fantasy
description: It's been a heck of a long day and you're exhausted. It's a miserably cold, stormy Thursday evening and you've finished your first part-time job at the call centre of the tech firm. You want nothing more than a relaxing bath, and to curl up in front of a fire and fall blissfully asleep. Sadly, instead you’re driving to Madam’s the most exclusive brothel in town.  In this pick your path erotic tale you are Sugar an aspiring actress and call girl. What follows is up to you, but expect plenty of kinky hi-jinx.  This book has 15 naughty endings to choose from in 87,000 words.  This book contains a plethora of graphic sex scenes and intended for mature adults.
author: Stephanie D. Nalle
